com.dtolabs.rundeck.core.plugins

Class FilePluginCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dtolabs.rundeck.core.plugins.FilePluginCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PluginCache

    public class FilePluginCache
extends java.lang.Object
implements PluginCache
    FilePluginCache uses a filecache and a set of PluginScanners to cache and create ProviderLoader instances associated with files.
    The instances are returned for ProviderIdent instances.
